response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with our premier product, which we believe would greatly benefit and enhance your operations. Given its exceptional value and capabilities, we estimate its worth to be around $1,000,000 to us. Considering its significance to you, we are offering it at a special price tailored to your needs. We kindly propose a price of $950,000 for this remarkable opportunity. We are confident that this investment will pay off in numerous ways, providing substantial returns on your expenditure. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 950000}
